content: Non è perché non voglio che tu rida di me, piuttosto è perché io vorrei ridere di te.
translations: eng:It is not because I do not want you to laugh at me, rather it is because I would like to laugh at you
eng:It isn't because I don't want you to laugh at me, rather it is because I'd like to laugh at you
eng:It's not because I don't want you to laugh at me, it's because I'd like rather to laugh at you
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
